gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi

Class ABContactSearchSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi.ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging
      • gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi.ABContactSearchSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABContactDocumentSearchSpec

    public class ABContactSearchSpec
extends ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging
implements GWRemotable
    This class has parameters related to paging and sorting in addition to the ContactManager specific parameters in ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging. This is used by non-UI code which has to control paging and sorting.

    • Method Detail

      • isGetNumResultsOnly

        public boolean isGetNumResultsOnly()
        Returns:
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • setGetNumResultsOnly

        public void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean getNumResultsOnly)
        Parameters:
        getNumResultsOnly - If set to true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • getSortColumns

        public ABContactSearchSortColumn[] getSortColumns()
        Returns:
        Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • setSortColumns

        public void setSortColumns(ABContactSearchSortColumn[] sortColumns)
        Parameters:
        sortColumns - Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • getStartRow

        public int getStartRow()
        Returns:
        Specifies the first row to return.

      • setStartRow

        public void setStartRow(int startRow)
        Parameters:
        startRow - Specifies the first row to return.

      • getChunkSize

        public int getChunkSize()
        Returns:
        Specifies the number of results to return.

      • setChunkSize

        public void setChunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Parameters:
        chunkSize - Specifies the number of results to return.

      • isExcludeTotal

        public boolean isExcludeTotal()
        Returns:
        Determines whether to exclude the total number of results in the search result.

      • setExcludeTotal

        public void setExcludeTotal(boolean excludeTotal)
        Parameters:
        excludeTotal - Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.
